metadata.title: CVE-2016-2039 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libraries/session.inc.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.13, 4.4.xbefore 4.4.15.3, and 4.5.x before 4.5.4 does not properly generate CSRFtoken values, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended accessrestrictions by predicting a value.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
